statements: UPDATE suspicious_activities SET activity_type = 'Login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE suspicious_activities SET query_executed = 'SELECT * FROM users;' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE suspicious_activities SET query_executed = 'SELECT * FROM users;' WHERE user_id = 101 AND activity_type = 'SQL Injection'
UPDATE suspicious_activities SET activity_time = '2023-10-20 08:30:00' WHERE activity_type = 'Data Exfiltration' AND user_id = 102

UPDATE suspicious_queries SET timestamp = '2023-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE query_id = 10;

UPDATE suspicious_queries SET timestamp = '2022-01-05 08:30:00', query = 'Suspicious query detected' WHERE query_id = 10 AND user_id = 201;
UPDATE unauthorized_changes SET query = 'Modified query 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suspicious_activities SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE unauthorized_changes SET query = 'Modified query 1', timestamp = '2022-10-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 101
UPDATE suspicious_activities SET description = 'Suspicious activity detected', activity_type = 'SQL Injection', timestamp = '2022-10-15 12:45:00' WHERE id = 201
UPDATE table1 SET query = 'SELECT * FROM users' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE table2 SET action = 'login', action_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE table1 SET query = 'New query', query_timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
